"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5522c881636872273c330a00#post_5522c881636872273c330a00
Idunno; you just seem to instantly get pissed off at people whenever there's expression of sexuality so it just seems kind of weird that you would like a anime about yuri.  You just seem to go from 0 to supersayain 2 whenever sexuality is involved.  It'd be like watching someone that gets furious whenever people kiss on tv or such go "I like romance movies"; of course it would turn a few heads.  I mean you've yelled at a couple users before for talking about gay stuff so it's just kind of weird you know.  It's kind of a asinine thing, but I just kind of assumed you hated stuff like sakura trick.  Basically: you've gotten furious with people for gay stuff -> would not have expected you to enjoy a anime about gay stuff.

Kubo is strange man. His artwork is good, in that his character designs are fucking amazing. But where he suffers is backgrounds and panel layout. Trying reading a recent chapter of Bleach. The panels are often huge and most of the time their virtually blank. If Kubo wanted to do guest designs for a fighting game though, I would buy it.
